structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: No person shall be appointed a member of the fire department in fire protection districts on account of any political service, contribution, sentiment, or affiliation. No member shall be dismissed, suspended, or reduced in grade or pay for any political opinion.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 127, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 207, sec. 6, effective February 28, 1956.
